attributes.review: This app horrible and false first of all it asks for personal info which is very odd seconded it doesn’t even load half the time don’t download it it’s a waste of time and energy✨🧚‍♀️👀
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I do hope Apple does what needs to be done and takes down this app. 🤢 horrible and I have too many adds! And I can’t get any offers or deals 😤
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: The app is absolutely terrible and I have tried many like it but the ones that aren’t seem to just work better. I hope that this app can’t be shared bcs it just wastes space 🤮
attributes.title: Eww

attributes.review: The screen kept turning orange and played a really bad song and all the rats came out of my basement and then and then there was this ad that came up for a super orange spray tan I don’t know what to do.
attributes.title: Terrible don’t download

attributes.review: Worst app!!!! Do not download it glitched on my phone a lot. And when I got it to work somewhat it would crash or take forever to load. Don’t waste your time on this app.
attributes.title: Don’t download!

attributes.review: This app took hours to install! And when it did, it wouldn’t even work!!! Don’t download this, it isn’t worth it. Just like that vote for trump you were about to send in.
attributes.title: Terrible app!!!

attributes.review: Every part of this app has been annoyingly difficult to use and all of the information is difficult to understand!! Bad!
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: it was the worst experience of my life. I downloaded the app and immediately these little orange rats spewing nonsense started crawling all over me! and the things they would say! appalling. never EVER will be recommending this, horrendous.
attributes.title: terrible!!! orange rats all over!!!

attributes.review: This app is so slow I bet they hired some cheap programming team to make this garbage. It’s even worse than Google classroom, like seriously it’s so bad.
attributes.title: pure trash ( I wish I could give it a -1 star rating )

attributes.review: this app killed my family and ate my dog and shot me 7 times. i plan on not ever wasting my time on this app. this infested my house with roaches and the roaches are 20 feet tall and deadly so i had to move to my grandma’s house. my grandma got the app and then she died.. DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DESPICABLE
